# GSit

:::tip Available on servers
**Overnight**
:::

**GSit** is a plugin that allows you to sit and lie anywhere.

---

## ğŸª‘ Features

- **Sit** â€” on the ground, blocks, anywhere
- **Lie** â€” rest wherever you want
- **Ride** â€” sit on other players

---

## ğŸ“‹ Commands

| Command | Description |
|---------|----------|
| `/sit` | Sit in place |
| `/lay` | Lie in place |

---

## ğŸ® How to Use

### Sit

Simply type `/sit` â€” your character will sit where they stand.

### Lie

Type `/lay` â€” character will lie on the ground.

### Sit on Player

1. Make sure **both hands are empty**
2. Press **RMB** on another player
3. You'll sit on their shoulders!

:::tip Tip
This is a great way to travel together or make funny screenshots!
:::

---

## ğŸ’¡ Usage Ideas

### Rest by the Fire

Sit near a campfire with `/sit` command for atmospheric rest.

### Photo Sessions

Use `/sit` and `/lay` to create interesting screenshots with friends.

### Waiting for Friends

Sit at spawn while waiting for friends â€” it looks more natural.

## â“ FAQ

<details>
<summary>**Can I sit on stairs?**</summary>

Yes! You can sit on stairs, slabs and many other blocks by simply pressing RMB on them with empty hands (if enabled on the server).

</details>

<details>
<summary>**How to stand up?**</summary>

Just press **Shift** (sneak) or start moving â€” you'll automatically stand up.

</details>

<details>
<summary>**Player won't let me sit on them?**</summary>

They may have protection from this enabled, or your hands are not empty.

</details>
